Public NotInheritable Class FtpWebRequest Inherits WebRequest
public ref class FtpWebRequest sealed : System::Net::WebRequest

summary.span: Implements a File Transfer Protocol (FTP) client.

span.span: Implements a File Transfer Protocol (FTP) client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得的執行個體，使用方法。To obtain an instance of , use the method. 您也可以使用上傳和下載資訊從 FTP 伺服器的類別。You can also use the class to upload and download information from an FTP server. 使用任一種方法，當您指定使用 FTP 配置網路資源 (例如`"ftp://contoso.com"`)類別讓您能夠以程式設計方式與 FTP 伺服器互動。Using either of these approaches, when you specify a network resource that uses the FTP scheme (for example, `"ftp://contoso.com"`) the class provides the ability to programmatically interact with FTP servers. URI 可以是相對或絕對。The URI may be relative or absolute. 如果 URI 的形式`"ftp://contoso.com/%2fpath"`(%2f 是逸出 '/')，然後 URI 是絕對的目前的目錄是`/path`。If the URI is of the form `"ftp://contoso.com/%2fpath"` (%2f is an escaped '/'), then the URI is absolute, and the current directory is `/path`. 如果，不過，URI 的格式是`"ftp://contoso.com/path"`，.NET Framework 第一次登入 FTP 伺服器 (使用使用者名稱和密碼設定屬性)，則目前的目錄設為`/path`。If, however, the URI is of the form `"ftp://contoso.com/path"`, first the .NET Framework logs into the FTP server (using the user name and password set by the property), then the current directory is set to `/path`. 您必須擁有有效的使用者名稱和密碼的伺服器或伺服器必須允許匿名登入。You must have a valid user name and password for the server or the server must allow anonymous logon. 您可以指定用來設定連線到伺服器的認證屬性，或者您可以將其併入URI 的一部分傳遞至方法。You can specify the credentials used to connect to the server by setting the property or you can include them in the portion of the URI passed to the method. 如果您納入URI 中的資訊屬性設定為新的網路認證，使用指定的使用者名稱和密碼資訊。If you include information in the URI, the property is set to a new network credential with the specified user name and password information. > [!CAUTION] > 除非屬性是`true`，所有資料和命令，包括您的使用者名稱和密碼資訊，都傳送到伺服器以純文字。Unless the property is `true`, all data and commands, including your user name and password information, are sent to the server in clear text. 監視網路流量的任何人都可以檢視您的認證，並使用它們來連線到伺服器。Anyone monitoring network traffic can view your credentials and use them to connect to the server. 如果您要連接到 FTP 伺服器需要認證，並支援 Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)，您應該設定至`true`。If you are connecting to an FTP server that requires credentials and supports Secure Sockets Layer (SSL), you should set to `true`. 您必須擁有來存取 FTP 資源; 否則擲回例外狀況。You must have to access the FTP resource; otherwise, a exception is thrown. 指定要傳送至伺服器所設定的 FTP 命令屬性中定義的值為結構。Specify the FTP command to send to the server by setting the property to a value defined in the structure. 若要傳輸的文字資料，變更從其預設值的屬性 (`true`) 以`false`。To transmit text data, change the property from its default value (`true`) to `false`. 如需詳細資訊和限制，請參閱。For details and restrictions, see . 使用時物件，將檔案上傳至伺服器，您必須將檔案內容寫入要求資料流取得藉由呼叫方法或其非同步對應項目和方法。When using an object to upload a file to a server, you must write the file content to the request stream obtained by calling the method or its asynchronous counterparts, the and methods. 您必須寫入資料流，並傳送要求之前關閉資料流。You must write to the stream and close the stream before sending the request. 要求時，會傳送到伺服器上，藉由呼叫方法或其非同步對應項目和方法。Requests are sent to the server by calling the method or its asynchronous counterparts, the and methods. 要求的作業完成時，會傳回物件。When the requested operation completes, an object is returned. 物件提供的作業，以及從伺服器下載的任何資料的狀態。The object provides the status of the operation and any data downloaded from the server. 您可以設定的讀取或寫入使用的伺服器逾時值屬性。You can set a time-out value for reading or writing to the server by using the property. 如果超過逾時期限時，呼叫的方法會擲回具有設定為。If the time-out period is exceeded, the calling method throws a with set to . 如果命令成功，請從 FTP 伺服器下載檔案，回應物件的資料流中會提供 要求檔案的內容。When downloading a file from an FTP server, if the command was successful, the contents of the requested file are available in the response object's stream. 您可以藉由呼叫來存取這個資料流方法。You can access this stream by calling the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 如果屬性，請直接設定或組態檔中，與 FTP 伺服器通訊都會經過指定的 proxy。If the property is set, either directly or in a configuration file, communications with the FTP server are made through the specified proxy. 如果指定的 proxy 是 HTTP proxy，只有， ，和支援命令。If the specified proxy is an HTTP proxy, only the , , and commands are supported. 下載的二進位內容只會快取;也就是使用所接收的內容命令搭配屬性設定為`true`。Only downloaded binary content is cached; that is, content received using the command with the property set to `true`. 多個s 盡可能重複使用現有的連線。Multiple s reuse existing connections, if possible. 如需有關 FTP 通訊協定的詳細資訊，請參閱[RFC 959： 檔案傳輸通訊協定](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc959.txt)。For more information about the FTP protocol, see [RFC 959: File Transfer Protocol](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc959.txt). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 FTP 伺服器刪除檔案。The following code example demonstrates deleting a file from an FTP server. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#4)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 FTP 伺服器下載檔案，使用類別。The following code example demonstrates downloading a file from an FTP server by using the class. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#5)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用非同步作業的檔案上傳至 FTP 伺服器。The following code example demonstrates using asynchronous operations to upload a file to an FTP server. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpAsync/CPP/async.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpAsync/CS/async.cs#1)]

summary.span: Terminates an asynchronous FTP operation.

span.span: Terminates an asynchronous FTP operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有進行中的作業，這個方法沒有任何作用。If there is no operation in progress, this method does nothing. 如果正在進行中的檔案傳輸，這個方法會結束此傳輸。If a file transfer is in progress, this method terminates the transfer. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用者可以列印文件的終止，請從本機目錄的檔案伺服器的非同步上傳。The following code example demonstrates how the user can terminate an asynchronous upload of a file from the local directory to the server. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須完成的非同步作業，藉由呼叫方法。You must complete the asynchronous operation by calling the method. 通常所參考的方法會呼叫`callback`。Typically, is called by the method referenced by `callback`. 若要判斷作業的狀態，請檢查屬性這個方法所傳回的物件。To determine the state of the operation, check the properties in the object returned by this method. 這個方法不會封鎖等待資料流。This method does not block while waiting for the stream. 若要封鎖，請呼叫取代此方法。To block, call in place of this method. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何開始非同步作業以取得要求的資料流。The following code example demonstrates beginning an asynchronous operation to get a request's stream. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpAsync/CPP/async.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpAsync/CS/async.cs#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須完成的非同步作業，藉由呼叫方法。You must complete the asynchronous operation by calling the method. 通常所參考的方法會呼叫`callback`。Typically, is called by the method referenced by `callback`. 若要判斷作業的狀態，請檢查屬性所傳回的物件方法。To determine the state of the operation, check the properties in the object returned by the method. 如果屬性，請直接設定或組態檔中，與 FTP 伺服器通訊都會經過指定的 proxy。If the property is set, either directly or in a configuration file, communications with the FTP server are made through the specified proxy. 不會封鎖在等候伺服器回應時。 does not block while waiting for the response from the server. 若要封鎖，請呼叫方法取代。To block, call the method in place of . 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果會擲回，使用和要決定從伺服器回應的例外狀況的屬性。If a is thrown, use the and properties of the exception to determine the response from the server. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何結束非同步作業，以取得要求的資料流，然後再啟動 取得回應的要求。The following code example demonstrates ending an asynchronous operation to get a request's stream, and then starting a request to get the response. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpAsync#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpAsync/CPP/async.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpAsync#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpAsync/CS/async.cs#5)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the certificates used for establishing an encrypted connection to the FTP server.

span.span: Gets or sets the certificates used for establishing an encrypted connection to the FTP server.

value.span: 物件，包含用戶端憑證。

span.span: An object that contains the client certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用戶端憑證用來驗證用戶端在初始的 SSL 連線交涉期間。Client certificates are used to authenticate the client during the initial SSL connection negotiation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . > [!NOTE] > .NET Framework 在建立快取的 SSL 工作階段，並嘗試盡可能重複使用快取的工作階段，對新的要求。The .NET Framework caches SSL sessions as they are created and attempts to reuse a cached session for a new request, if possible. 嘗試將重複使用的 SSL 工作階段時，.NET Framework 使用的第一個元素（如果有一個），或嘗試重複使用 「 匿名 」 工作階段，如果是空的。When attempting to reuse an SSL session, the .NET Framework uses the first element of (if there is one), or tries to reuse an anonymous session if is empty.

exception.span: The value specified for a set operation is .

span.span: The value specified for a set operation is .

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the connection group that contains the service point used to send the current request.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the connection group that contains the service point used to send the current request.

value.span: 值，包含連接群組名稱。

span.span: A value that contains a connection group name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接群組關聯至一組要求特定連接或連接集合。Connection groups associate a set of requests with a particular connection or set of connections. 可以重複使用的連接群組中的連線，只有起始的要求在相同的應用程式網域中，當要求的認證相同，而且要求指定的連接群組名稱。The connections in a connection group can be reused only by requests originating in the same application domain, when the credentials on the request are the same and the request specifies the connection group name. 當要求未指定連接群組名稱時，可以使用所要求的伺服器不被使用連接群組相關聯的任何現有連線。When a request does not specify a connection group name, any existing connection to the requested server that is not associated with a connection group can be used. 認證不相同時，現有的連接已關閉，且必須重新驗證新的要求。When the credentials are not the same, the existing connection is closed and the new request must be reauthenticated. 使用連接群組可以改善效能，因為這可讓所有使用者重複使用連線使用者的認證通過驗證的要求。Using connection groups can improve performance because this allows all of the requests for a user to reuse the connection authenticated with the user's credentials. 變更屬性之後呼叫， ， ，或方法會使例外狀況。Changing the property after calling the , , , or method causes an exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會擷取這個屬性的值。The following code example retrieves the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#16)]

exception.span: A new value was specified for this property for a request that is already in progress.

span.span: A new value was specified for this property for a request that is already in progress.

summary.span: Gets or sets a byte offset into the file being downloaded by this request.

span.span: Gets or sets a byte offset into the file being downloaded by this request.

value.span: 執行個體，指定檔案位移 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: An instance that specifies the file offset, in bytes.

value.span: 預設值是零。

span.span: The default value is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定從 FTP 伺服器下載檔案時的屬性。Set the property when downloading a file from an FTP server. 此位移表示標記的下載資料開始的伺服器的檔案中的位置。This offset indicates the position in the server's file that marks the start of the data to be downloaded. 從檔案開頭的位元組數目為指定的位移第一個位元組的位移為零。The offset is specified as the number of bytes from the start of the file; the offset of the first byte is zero. 設定會導致將重新啟動 (`REST`) 命令至伺服器。Setting causes the to send a restart (`REST`) command to the server. 如果您要將資料上傳到伺服器，則大多數的 FTP 伺服器實作會忽略此命令。This command is ignored by most FTP server implementations if you are uploading data to the server. 變更之後呼叫， ， ，或方法會使例外狀況。Changing after calling the , , , or method causes an exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範從一部伺服器和將已下載的資料附加到本機檔案的下載檔的一部分。The following code example demonstrates downloading part of a file from a server and appending the downloaded data to a local file. [!code-cpp[NclFtpClient#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NclFtpClient#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#7)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the credentials used to communicate with the FTP server.

span.span: Gets or sets the credentials used to communicate with the FTP server.

value.span: 執行個體；如果屬性尚未設定，則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不需要使用匿名登入進行連接時指定的認證。You are not required to specify credentials when connecting using anonymous logon. 您必須設定屬性所使用的認證類型; 這可確保該使用者名稱和密碼可以讀取及傳送至伺服器。You must set the property by using a credential of type ; this ensures that the user name and password can be read and sent to the server. > [!CAUTION] > 除非伺服器傳輸到伺服器時，不會加密認證資訊屬性設定為`true`。Credentials information is not encrypted when transmitted to the server unless the property is set to `true`. 變更之後呼叫， ， ，或方法會使例外狀況。Changing after calling the , , , or method causes an exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會擷取這個屬性的值，並用它來顯示使用者名稱。The following code example retrieves the value of this property and uses it to display the user name. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#14)]

.property class System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy DefaultCachePolicy
Public Shared Property DefaultCachePolicy As RequestCachePolicy

summary.span: Defines the default cache policy for all FTP requests.

span.span: Defines the default cache policy for all FTP requests.

value.span: ，定義 FTP 要求的快取原則。

span.span: A that defines the cache policy for FTP requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用所接收的內容命令會快取。Only content received using the command is cached. 下表描述的快取原則上的 FTP 影響。The following table describes the effects of FTP caching policies on . |原則Policy|作用Effect| |------------|------------| ||如果資源是新的、 內容長度正確無誤，且到期、 修改和內容長度屬性都存在，則會傳回快取的資源。Returns the cached resource if the resource is fresh, the content length is accurate, and the expiration, modification, and content length attributes are present.| ||從伺服器傳回的資源。Returns the resource from the server.| ||如果內容長度，且符合項目大小; 會傳回快取的資源否則，會擲回。Returns the cached resource if the content length is present and matches the entry size; otherwise, throws a .| ||如果內容長度提供，且符合項目大小; 會傳回快取的資源否則，資源從伺服器下載，並傳回給呼叫者。Returns the cached resource if the content length is provided and matches the entry size; otherwise, the resource is downloaded from the server and is returned to the caller.| ||如果時間戳記的快取的資源是與伺服器上資源的時間戳記相同，會傳回快取的資源否則為資源是從伺服器下載、 儲存在快取，並傳回給呼叫端。Returns the cached resource if the timestamp of the cached resource is the same as the time stamp of the resource on the server; otherwise, the resource is downloaded from the server, stored in the cache, and returned to the caller.| ||從伺服器下載的資源、 將它儲存在快取，並傳回給呼叫端。Downloads the resource from the server, stores it in the cache, and returns the resource to the caller.| ||如果快取的資源存在，則會將它刪除。If a cached resource exists, it is deleted. 資源從伺服器下載，並傳回給呼叫者。The resource is downloaded from the server and is returned to the caller.| > [!NOTE] > 設定會覆寫任何組態設定。Setting overrides any configuration setting.

span.span: if control and data transmissions are encrypted; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 除非屬性是`true`，所有資料和命令，包括您的使用者名稱和密碼資訊，都傳送到伺服器以純文字。Unless the property is `true`, all data and commands, including your user name and password information, are sent to the server in clear text. 監視網路流量的任何人都可以檢視您的認證，並使用它們來連線到伺服器。Anyone monitoring network traffic can view your credentials and use them to connect to the server. 如果您要連接到 FTP 伺服器需要認證，並支援 SSL，您應該設定至`true`。If you are connecting to an FTP server that requires credentials and supports SSL, you should set to `true`. `"AUTH TLS"`命令時，會傳送到伺服器上，若要要求加密工作階段。The `"AUTH TLS"` command is sent to the server to request an encrypted session. 如果伺服器無法辨識此命令，您會收到例外狀況。If the server does not recognize this command, you receive a exception. ## Examples 下列的程式碼範例會使用加密的連線，若要下載的目錄清單從 FTP 伺服器。The following code example uses an encrypted connection to download the directory listing from an FTP server. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#8)]

exception.span: The connection to the FTP server has already been established.

span.span: The connection to the FTP server has already been established.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果作業尚未完成，方法會封鎖直到作業完成為止。If the operation has not completed, the method blocks until the operation completes. 若要判斷作業是否已經完成，請檢查屬性，然後再呼叫。To determine whether the operation has completed, check the property before calling . 除了 < 例外狀況 > 中所述的例外狀況開啟供寫入資料流時所擲回的例外狀況重新擲回。In addition to the exceptions noted in "Exceptions," rethrows exceptions that were thrown while opening the stream for writing. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何結束非同步作業以取得要求的資料流。The following code example demonstrates ending an asynchronous operation to get a request's stream. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果作業尚未完成當時呼叫方法時，封鎖直到作業完成為止。If the operation has not completed at the time the method is called, blocks until the operation completes. 若要防止封鎖，請檢查屬性，然後再呼叫。To prevent blocking, check the property before calling . 除了 < 例外狀況 > 中所述的例外狀況與伺服器通訊時所擲回的例外狀況重新擲回。In addition to the exceptions noted in "Exceptions," rethrows exceptions that were thrown while communicating with the server. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何結束非同步作業以取得回應。The following code example demonstrates ending an asynchronous operation to get a response. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定要求屬性，才能呼叫方法。Set the request properties before calling the method. 之後將資料寫入資料流中，您必須關閉再傳送要求資料流。After writing the data to the stream, you must close the stream prior to sending the request. 如果您未設定屬性，以或，您無法取得資料流。If you have not set the property to or , you cannot get the stream. 等候資料流的區塊。 blocks while waiting for the stream. 若要避免這個問題，呼叫方法取代。To prevent this, call the method in place of . > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將檔案複製到要求的資料流，並將要求傳送至伺服器，以將資料上傳，並將其附加至檔案。The following code example demonstrates copying a file to a request's data stream and sending a request to the server to upload the data and append it to a file. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要存取的 FTP 特定屬性，您必須轉型至這個方法所傳回的物件。To access the FTP-specific properties, you must cast the object returned by this method to . 會導致控制連線建立，可能也會建立資料連接。 causes a control connection to be established, and might also create a data connection. 封鎖，直到收到回應。 blocks until the response is received. 若要避免這個問題，您可以執行這項作業以非同步方式呼叫並方法，取代。To prevent this, you can perform this operation asynchronously by calling the and methods in place of . 如果屬性，請直接設定或組態檔中，與 FTP 伺服器通訊都會經過 proxy。If the property is set, either directly or in a configuration file, communications with the FTP server are made through the proxy. 如果會擲回，使用和要決定從伺服器回應的例外狀況的屬性。If a is thrown, use the and properties of the exception to determine the response from the server. 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 多次呼叫傳回相同的回應物件中; 要求不會重新發出。Multiple calls to return the same response object; the request is not reissued. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將檔案複製到要求的資料流，並傳送要求，以將資料附加至伺服器的檔案。The following code example demonstrates copying a file to a request's data stream and sending a request to append data to a file to the server. 此範例會呼叫傳送要求，並封鎖，直到伺服器所傳回的回應。The example calls to send the request and block until the response is returned by the server. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定哪一個命令傳送至伺服器。The property determines which command is sent to the server. 您設定使用的公用欄位成員中定義的字串類別。You set the by using the strings defined in the public field members of the class. 請注意，字串中定義類別是唯一支援的選項，如屬性。Note that the strings defined in the class are the only supported options for the property. 設定屬性設為任何其他值將會導致例外狀況。Setting the property to any other value will result in an exception. 設定時要，您必須先呼叫進行方法。When setting to , you must do so before calling the method. 無法正確的順序會導致呼叫這些成員例外狀況，當您嘗試取得要求資料流。Failure to call these members in the correct order causes a exception when you attempt to get the request stream. 認證提供給物件必須具有權限可以執行指定的方法。The credentials supplied for the object must have permission to perform the specified method. 如果沒有，則 FTP 命令會失敗。If not, the FTP command fails. 若要判斷成功或失敗的命令，檢查和屬性。To determine the success or failure of a command, check the and properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將這個屬性設定為。The following code example sets this property to . value.span: 負責與 FTP 伺服器通訊的 執行個體。

span.span: An instance responsible for communicating with the FTP server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會識別與 FTP 伺服器通訊的執行個體。The property identifies the instance that communicates with the FTP server. Proxy 是由系統設定，藉由使用組態檔和 Internet Explorer 區域網路設定。The proxy is set by the system by using configuration files and the Internet Explorer Local Area Network settings. 若要指定任何 proxy，應使用，請設定所傳回的 proxy 執行個體方法。To specify that no proxy should be used, set to the proxy instance returned by the method. 如需有關自動 proxy 偵測的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 自動 Proxy 偵測](~/docs/framework/network-programming/automatic-proxy-detection.md)。For more information about automatic proxy detection, see [Automatic Proxy Detection](~/docs/framework/network-programming/automatic-proxy-detection.md). 您必須設定之前將資料寫入至要求的資料流，或取得回應。You must set before writing data to the request's stream or getting the response. 變更之後呼叫， ， ，或方法會使例外狀況。Changing after calling the , , , or method causes an exception. 類別支援 HTTP 和 ISA 防火牆用戶端 proxy。The class supports HTTP and ISA Firewall Client proxies. 如果指定的 proxy 是 HTTP proxy，只有， ，和支援命令。If the specified proxy is an HTTP proxy, only the , , and commands are supported. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示這個屬性值。The following code example displays this property value. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#16)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a time-out when reading from or writing to a stream.

span.span: Gets or sets a time-out when reading from or writing to a stream.

value.span: 讀取或寫入逾時前的毫秒數。預設值為 300,000 毫秒 (5 分鐘)。

span.span: The number of milliseconds before the reading or writing times out. The default value is 300,000 milliseconds (5 minutes).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 寫入至所傳回的資料流時使用方法或從傳回的資料流讀取方法。The is used when writing to the stream returned by the method or reading from the stream returned by the method. 具體而言，屬性控制的逾時值方法，用來讀取傳回之資料流方法，以及方法，用來寫入資料流由方法。Specifically, the property controls the time-out for the method, which is used to read the stream returned by the method, and for the method, which is used to write to the stream returned by the method. 如果超過逾時期限時，呼叫的方法會擲回具有設定為。If the time-out period is exceeded, the calling method throws a with set to . 若要指定的等候要求完成的時間量，請使用屬性。To specify the amount of time to wait for the request to complete, use the property.

summary.span: Gets the object used to connect to the FTP server.

span.span: Gets the object used to connect to the FTP server.

value.span: 可以用來自訂連接行為的 物件。

span.span: A object that can be used to customize connection behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有物件存在，一個建立 FTP 伺服器。If no object exists, one is created for the FTP server. 若要設定的 FTP 伺服器開啟的連線數目上限，將屬性這個屬性所傳回的執行個體。To set the maximum number of connections that can be open for an FTP server, set the property of the instance returned by this property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會擷取要求的服務點和其中一個設定的連線數目上限。The following code example retrieves the service point from a request and sets the maximum number of connections to one. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds to wait for a request.

span.span: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds to wait for a request.

value.span: 值，包含要求逾時之前等待的毫秒數。預設值是 。

span.span: An value that contains the number of milliseconds to wait before a request times out. The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定無限值，設定屬性設(-1)。To specify an infinite value, set the property to (-1). 這是預設值。This is the default value. 會提出同步要求的毫秒數方法會等候回應且; 方法等候資料流。 is the number of milliseconds that a synchronous request made with the method waits for a response and that the method waits for a stream. 如果資源沒有回應的逾時期限內，要求會擲回具有屬性設定為。If a resource does not respond within the time-out period, the request throws a with the property set to . 變更之後呼叫， ， ，或方法會使例外狀況。Changing after calling the , , , or method causes an exception. 網域名稱系統 (DNS) 查詢可能需要最多 15 秒鐘傳回或逾時。如果您的要求包含需要解析的主機名稱，而且您設定的值小於 15 秒，可能需要 15 秒以上之前就會擲回以指出您的要求逾時。A Domain Name System (DNS) query may take up to 15 seconds to return or time out. If your request contains a host name that requires resolution and you set to a value less than 15 seconds, it may take 15 seconds or more before a is thrown to indicate a time-out on your request. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定這個屬性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#23)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the data type for file transfers.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the data type for file transfers.

value.span: 向伺服器表示，要傳輸的資料是二進位資料； 則表示資料是文字。

span.span: to indicate to the server that the data to be transferred is binary; to indicate that the data is text.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您傳送二進位資料，例如影像，會將此屬性設定為`true`。If you are sending binary data, such as an image, set this property to `true`. 如果您要傳送的文字，將屬性設定為`false`。If you are sending text, set the property to `false`. 指定`true`會導致傳送`"TYPE I"`命令至伺服器。Specifying `true` causes the to send a `"TYPE I"` command to the server. 指定`false`會導致傳送`"Type A"`命令至伺服器。Specifying `false` causes the to send a `"Type A"` command to the server. FTP 伺服器可以忽略這些命令。FTP servers can ignore these commands. 變更之後呼叫， ， ，或方法會使例外狀況。Changing after calling the , , , or method causes an exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例擷取並顯示針對指定的屬性值物件。The following code example retrieves and displays property values for a specified object. summary.span: Gets or sets the behavior of a client application's data transfer process.

span.span: Gets or sets the behavior of a client application's data transfer process.

value.span: 如果用戶端應用程式的資料傳輸處理序會接聽資料連接埠上的連接，則為 ；如果用戶端應該在資料連接埠上啟始連接，則為 。

span.span: if the client application's data transfer process listens for a connection on the data port; otherwise, if the client should initiate a connection on the data port.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性，以`true`會傳送 「`PASV"`命令至伺服器。Setting the property to `true` sends the "`PASV"` command to the server. 此命令會要求伺服器資料連接埠上接聽並等候連接，而不是起始一個收到傳送命令。This command requests the server to listen on a data port and to wait for a connection rather than initiate one upon receipt of a transfer command. 如需描述使用指定的行為，請參閱 < [RFC 959: 「 檔案傳輸通訊協定 」，第 3.2 節: 「 建立資料連線 」 和區段 4.1.2: 「 傳送參數命令 」](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc959.txt)。For a description of the behaviors that are specified using , see [RFC 959: "File Transfer Protocol", Section 3.2: "Establishing Data Connections" and Section 4.1.2: "Transfer Parameter Commands"](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc959.txt). 變更之後呼叫， ， ，或方法會使例外狀況。Changing after calling the , , , or method causes an exception. 如果設為`true`、 FTP 伺服器可能不會傳送檔案的大小和下載進度可以永遠是零。If is set to `true`, the FTP server may not send the size of the file, and download progress can always be zero. 如果設為`false`，防火牆可以發出警示，並封鎖檔案下載。If is set to `false`, a firewall can raise an alert and block the file download. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例擷取並顯示針對指定的屬性值物件。The following code example retrieves and displays property values for a specified object. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#6)]
